mapper.select:
select rn ,postNo ,cateNo ,cateName ,title ,fileCnt ,name ,regDate ,hit from (select rownum rn ,postNo ,cateNo ,cateName ,title ,fileCnt ,name ,regDate ,hit from (select p.post_no postNo ,p.category_no cateNo ,category_name cateName ,title ,nvl(fileCnt, 0)fileCnt ,name ,to_char(p.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') regDate ,hit from post p, category c, users u, (select post_no ,count(file_no) fileCnt from files group by post_no) f where p.category_no = c.category_no and p.user_no = u.user_no and p.post_no = f.post_no(+)
and title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by p.reg_date desc))
where rn >= #{startRnum} and rn <= #{endRnum}

select count(*) from post p, users u where p.user_no = u.user_no
and p.title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and p.content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and u.name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select post_no postNo ,category_name cateName ,title ,u.user_no userNo ,name ,to_char(p.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm') regDate ,hit ,content from post p, category c, users u where p.category_no = c.category_no and p.user_no = u.user_no and post_no = #{no}
